titles: A Software Engineer, Professor and Researcher
presentation: Welcome to my website. This space has a simple purpose - to share my evolving <bold>ideas</bold> and <bold>thoughts</bold>. Consider it as my <bold>public workspace</bold>, where I engage in my <dgarden>digital gardening</dgarden> to cultivate and nurture new concepts. The notes on this website serve as a tool for my <bold>personal growth</bold>, <bold>learning</bold>, and <bold>creativity</bold>. Explore the other sections here and leave a comment if you feel like it. I'll be glad to reply 😄
